channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘The money went into his account’: Is my father trying to swindle me out of my grandparents’ $800K home?
item.description: “I came across a letter from my father’s bank showing a wire transfer of $195,000 from the buyer.”

item.title: After 9 months on hold, the Fed could cut rates in September. Why the long pause may extend stocks’ rally.
item.description: The long pause between rate cuts could be particularly bullish for equities, potentially extending and broadening the stock market’s rally, analysts s...

item.title: I’m a widow with $200,000 in a brokerage account. So why am I treated so poorly?
item.description: “I had to hunt high and low to have them sell my Tesla stock because it was tanking.”

item.title: Low expectations for retailers and ever-rising expectations for Nvidia in this week’s round of earnings
item.description: Earnings Watch: Nvidia reports amid questions about its ability to meet demand; also reporting are retailers like Gap and Ulta Beauty.

item.title: Are you middle class? No, you’re not. Here’s why.
item.description: The middle class is dead. Long live the middle class.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.
